---
title: "About the Project"
---

*The sources of representation bias: An historical political economy approach* (REPBIAS) is a research project with Marc Guinjoan as its Principal Researcher. It is funded by the Spanish Ministry of Science and Innovation.

The research project the objective to generate knowledge about the representation bias in the Spanish State, but also at the international level, through several channels. Some of them are the intentional malapportionment, minorities' rights, or the historical perspective.
